title: Update ticks-app to use new components
description:
Refactor /login and /app pages to use the new ticks-styled components instead of Shoelace:
- Replace sl-button with ticks-button
- Replace sl-input with ticks-input
- Replace sl-dialog with ticks-dialog
- Replace sl-spinner with ticks-spinner
- Use ticks-header for app header
- Use ticks-list-item for boards and tokens
- Use ticks-empty-state for empty lists
- Use ticks-alert for error messages
acceptance_criteria: Login and dashboard work with native ticks components
